attributes.action: force the EU (including Britain) to start using the local pronunciation of place names.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it that every country pronunces each other's country incorrectly? Why do the French prounce (and spell) England, Angleterre? Why do we say Germany and not Deutchland? The list goes on. It would help the world as a whole if we could communicate this properly.
